mulya sima, deshapalanamaya apeksha ho jathyanthara pidanaya nisa prathilabha sima kirimata godanangana lada pahasu paripalanamaya nirwachana nosalaka siyalu awathan pudgalayo samana ayithiwasikam bhukthi windithi. 9.150 kalochitha anagatha jathika idam prathipaththiyak sandaha margopadeshakathwaya sapayimata jathika idam komisamak pihituwime karyaya aanduwa wisin kadinamin sidukala yuthu bawa komisame mathaya we.

"man hithin witharak aadaraya karanawada?
ema jayagrahanayata uradun anek deshapalana paksha ha siwil kandayam pilibandawa elesa namin sandahan nokaranne eheyini.
thaman akamathi, dukbara ruduru bimithiru pahu karamin kurullek wage piyambaagena yanna thiyena aashawa, sahalluwa, ahinsakakama, me oonama deyak apita hitha athulen wigraha kara ganna puluwan.
hamoma kiyanne thama thaman budu dahama kiyala wiswasa karana de.
andan wathman aakruthi, transfomar ithali swamiwarun, wishwasaniya ha kriyakari we.

kodew pila awasan maha tharagayata piwisi mulma awasthawa meya wu athara mewara tharagawaliye supiri ata watayedi tharagayakin parajayata pathwi tharaga dekak jaya gaththeya.eeye pawathi dewani awasan purwa tharagaye kasiye wasiya dinagath kodew nayaka daran sami mulin panduwata paharadimata thiranaya kala athara oowar 20kadi kadulu 4kata lakunu 205k laba dawantha ilakkayak ostreliyanu pilata laba dunaneya.oowarayakata 10.25k wu dala lakunu wegayak sahitha ema ilakkaya hambaa yamata ostreliyanuwo asamath wuha.

sahithyaya wadagath wenne methanadi.shyamge kruthiya wannak kiyawa thibenawa nam ewannek kawadawath "demala ayata thibba prashne mokakda" wage prashna pandithamaniwa idiripath karanne naha.minis samajaye mathu wana prashna wala manushiya pathikadayan pilibada awama sanwedithawayak ho thibenawa nam kisiweku paramanu bomba nipadawa minisun wargika washayen sanharaya kirimak pilibada yojana karanne naha.

kesedayath, ahasa usata wisikarana lada galkatayak nawatha pahalata watenne yam se da, ipaduna wu sama minisekutama maranaya eekantha wanawa se ma, yam se rathriya gewi yana kalhi pasu dina hiru nagenawa se ma, gab gath mawak daruwa eekanthayen prasutha karanawa men ma, eekanthayenma mama buddhathwayata pathwima eekanthaya yanuweni.”melesa apa maha bodhi sathwayan purana lada paramitha nam danaya, silaya, naishkramya, pragnya, wirya, khanthi, sathya, adhishtana, maithriya ha upekshaya.
ithin me wana witath blak panthar dewannak nirmanaya karana bawa marwal studiyowa thahawuru kara thibenawa.

magin , thapala ho naw badu guwanin prawahanaya kirime wyaparayehi nirathawana kisiyam pudgalayaku wethoth ohu ee sandaha, pawathina nithiye prakara siwil guwan sewa adhyaksha janaral wisin nikuth karanu labana balapathrayak laba gatha yuthuya.
